resources.string:
:- 1Biswansi = 1/20 Biswa so convert according to your state

1) 5E-3 = 5 / 1000 = 0.005 e.g 4.64E-3 = 4.64 / 1000 = 0.00464

2)5E+3= 5 *1000=5000 e.g 4.56E+3 = 4.56 * 1000 = 4560

3)In Andhra Pradesh:-
Ankanam,Guntha,Kuncham unit is used

4)In Assam:-
Bigha,Kattha,Lecha unit is used

5)In Gujarat:-
Bigha

6)In Haryana:-
Bigha Pakka,Bigha Kachha,Biswa Pakka,Biswa Kachha,Ghumaon, Killa,Kanal,Sarsahi unit is used

7)In Himachal Pradesh:-
Bigha HP(Himachal Pradesh)-1,Bigha HP-2,Biswa HP-1,Biswa HP-2,Ghumaon,Kanal,Sarsahi unit is used

8)In Jammu and Kashmir:-
Kanal unit is used

9)In Jharkhand:-
Dhur unit is used

10)In Karnataka:-
Ankanam,Cent,Guntha unit is used

11)In Kerala:-
Cent unit is used

12)In Madhya Pradesh:-
Bigha,Kattha unit is used

13)Maharashtra:-
Guntha unit is used

14)In Punjab:-
Bigha Pakka,Bigha Kachha,Biswa Pakka,Biswa Kachha,Killa,Ghumaon,Kanal,Sarsahi(Square Karam) unit is used

15)In Rajasthan-
Bigha Rajasthan-1,Bigha Rajasthan-2,Biswa (Upper Parts),Biswa (Lower Parts)unit is used

16)In Tamil Nadu-
Cent,Ground unit is used

17)In Tripura-
Dhur unit is used

18)In Uttar Pradesh-
Bigha Pakka,Bigha Kachha,Biswa Pakka,Biswa Kachha unit is used

19)In Uttarakhand-
Bigha Uttarakhand-1,Bigha Uttarakhand-2,Biswa Uttarakhand-1,Uttarakhand-2 unit is used

20)In West Bengal-
Bigha,Chatak,Decimal unit is used

This app is used to convert one area unit into another unit.Mainly used for land area unit conversion.\n\nIt contains two section one secion is Common Standard unit includes Acre,Yard etc you can convert to one another and the second section is State Wise unit where you will get state wise unit e.g Bigha, Guntha etc to which you can convert to standard unit
All India state wise unit conversion
Acre | Bigha | Guntha | Biswa | Dhur | Ground | Feet | Yard | Cent | Kanal | Killa | Kattha | Kuncham | Sarashi
